name: Steel And Soul
description:
Steel & Soul is an Early-Access Singleplayer VR robot simulation game which aims to give the feeling of controlling giant war machine. Hop on robot's cockpit and fight to gain new mechs, weapons, body-parts and even new robots. Goal is to conquer resource stations in the map and protect them from your enemies. We are also planning to add Multiplayer soon!

In the game there are missions for you to accomplish such as capturing/covering station, neutralize all enemies in a particular area to get resources, convoy patrol and so on. When the game starts player is given a machine gun called MG-01. Player gain resources through the resource vehicles coming out of the stations. In this way, players unlock new weapons and robots. You have checkpoints marked on your map throughout the game. With ally robots, we will be in constant battle throughout the game.
